name: Future
description: FUTURE (FTR) TOKEN USE CASE 1) Future (FTR) token is locked when the user buys one of our products (utility token) 3) FTR holders will be given governance rights on decisions such as: the contracts/products FUTURE issues, use of development funds, potential partnerships and the future roadmap once initial rollout of the FUTURE decentralized ecosystem is complete 4) In addition to token rights, holding FTR gives access to a proprietary set of market visualization tools & data compiled by the FUTURE team
